songs.title: I Choose You
songs.lyrics:
I wonder if you’re happy where you’re at
Made sure that I had nothing left
You say it’s all because of me
Sleeping in the studio
Chasing my silly dreams
And you’ve got your own
Guess I’m holding you back from what’s yours
Only wanted to give you the world
Made it your oyster
Made you my pearl
I thought I took you out the mud
Apparently the mud is exactly where we were
Making you unable to be happy
All this time thought I gave you exactly
What you asked for
And even more
But perhaps I fell just a little short
Never thought you do the thing you done me
Never thought I’d see the day you wouldn’t run to me

I choose you
I choose you

I choose you
Baby I choose you



I think it’s you
Not me
You see other men
You’re the only one I see
I don’t understand
How you just walk away
And shit on our plans
I thought we were good
Guess I was fool
You broke all the rules
And that’s just not cool
Why’d I ever choose you
Never again will I be fooled by you
Yeah that pussy good But I won’t be weak
Imma be strong when you come around me
But don’t wear that thong around me
You know how I get
You know I like it
You know I like it

I choose you
I choose you

I choose you
Baby I choose you
